mapper.select:
select oycgSeq , oycgName , oycgDelNy
from oyCodeGroup
where 1=1 and oycgDelNy=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FROM oyCodeGroup ( oycgName , oycgDelNy ) values ( #(oycgName) ,0 )
mapper.select: select oycgSeq , oycgName , oycgDelNy from oyCode where 1=1 and oycgDelNy = 0 and oycgSeq = #{oycgSeq}

select oycdSeq , oycdName , oycdDelNy
from oyCode
where 1=1 and oycdDelNy=0
select oycdSeq , oycdName , oycdDelNy from oyCode where 1=1 and oycdDelNy = 0 and oycdSeq = #{oycdSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE oyCode SET oycdName = #{oycdName} WHERE 1=1 AND oycdSeq = #{oycdSeq}
